subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Keith Appling matched a career high with 25 points to help No. 1 Michigan State pull away to beat visiting Portland in its first game as a top-ranked team in 13 years.
snippet: Keith Appling matched a career high with 25 points to help No. 1 Michigan State pull away to beat visiting Portland in its first game as a top-ranked team in 13 years.
